name: 2024 The 2nd Asia Symposium on Image and Graphics
content: Publication: Submitted papers will be peer reviewed by conference committees, and accepted papers after proper registration and presentation will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 979-8-4007-0990-6), which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, submitted for indexing by Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc.
topics: Computer Graphics, Animation, Virtual Reality & Gaming
